title: Effects of abrasive particle size and molecular weight of poly(acrylic acid) in ceria slurry on removal selectivity of SiO2/Si3N4 films in shallow trench isolation chemical mechanical planarization

samples.experiment_context: Ceria abrasive calcined at 800°C (primary size ~36nm) in slurry with 0 wt% PAA (MW 30,000). Tested on blanket wafer.

abrasive_synthesis.milling_details: Dry jet mill (4h), Wet ball mill (35h)

slurry_preparation.preparation_steps: Ultrasonic treatment (2x 15 min, ice bath), Aging (12h room temp, shaker), Final ultrasonic (15 min)

characterization.particle_morphology: Polycrystalline, relatively high crystallinity, well-defined grains, uniformly distributed medium size

secondary_particle_size_median_d50.notes: Baseline size before PAA addition. Fig 4b shows trend.

samples.experiment_context: Ceria abrasive calcined at 800°C (primary size ~36nm) in slurry with ~0.1 wt% PAA (MW 30,000). Tested on blanket wafer.

abrasive_synthesis.milling_details: Dry jet mill (4h), Wet ball mill (35h)

characterization.particle_morphology: Polycrystalline, relatively high crystallinity, well-defined grains, uniformly distributed medium size

samples.experiment_context: Ceria abrasive calcined at 800°C (primary size ~36nm) in slurry with ~0.3 wt% PAA (MW 30,000). Tested on blanket wafer.

characterization.particle_morphology: Polycrystalline, relatively high crystallinity, well-defined grains, uniformly distributed medium size

samples.experiment_context: Ceria abrasive calcined at 800°C (primary size ~36nm) in slurry with 0.42 wt% PAA (MW 30,000). Tested on blanket and patterned wafers.

abrasive_synthesis.milling_details: Dry jet mill (4h), Wet ball mill (35h)

concentration.notes: Value used for patterned wafer tests (Fig 6)

characterization.particle_morphology: Polycrystalline, relatively high crystallinity, well-defined grains, uniformly distributed medium size

si3n4_erosion_patterned_5um_pitch_50dens.notes: Higher erosion compared to higher MW PAA (Fig 7b vs 7c, 7d). Order: C < B < A < D

sio2_dishing_patterned_wide_field.notes: Higher dishing compared to higher MW PAA (Fig 8a)

samples.experiment_context: Ceria abrasive calcined at 800°C (primary size ~36nm) in slurry with ~0.57 wt% PAA (MW 30,000). Tested on blanket wafer.

concentration.notes: Approximate value from Fig 5 / Table I max

samples.experiment_context: Ceria abrasive calcined at 700°C (primary size ~27nm) in slurry with 0 wt% PAA (MW 30,000). Tested on blanket wafer.

abrasive_synthesis.milling_details: Dry jet mill (2h), Wet ball mill (32h)

characterization.particle_morphology: Polycrystalline, relatively low crystallinity, wider size distribution (medium + small primary particles)

secondary_particle_size_distribution.notes: Higher range of large particles (>3µm) compared to 800C slurry without PAA (Fig 4a)

surface_roughness_rms_si3n4_patterned_10.source: Fig 9d image shown, value not stated, but visually similar to 800C/30k PAA
